alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Chuska Mountains; Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; San Francisco River Valley; Santa Fe Metro Area; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Upper Rio Grande Valley; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 2:44PM MDT until March 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest, southeast, and west central New Mexico. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may be restricted in blowing dust.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles.
